snippet.title: France's Louis Giscard d'Estaing running for office â€” in the U.S.
snippet.description: Son of former French president is running to represent French expatriates in North America

snippet.title: Ask Tom - With guest host Kathy Morgan of Citronelle
snippet.description: Washington Post food critic Tom Sietsema answers your questions, listens to your suggestions and even entertains your complaints about Washington dining.

snippet.title: Take the slow road: Route Nationale 7, the French connection
snippet.description: Writer Robert V. Camuto takes on a mission to drive almost every inch of France's mythic road, Route Nationale 7, which connects Paris to the Cote d'Azur by nearly 600 miles of what's now largely a back road through La France Profonde, or deep France.

snippet.title: All Over the Map
snippet.description: ** Hudson Restaurant & Lounge 2030 M St. NW. 202-872-8700 www.hudson-dc.com
